blueprintOwnerDescription.sling:message: Approval was completed on your page, and a minor version has been created. You may now perform a manual rollout.

kpmg.workflow.assetUploadActivate.movedT.sling:message: Your recently uploaded asset was of a file type that is not permitted within the DAM. This has been automatically moved to the disallowed folder.

kpmg.workflow.assetUploadActivate.pendin.sling:message: A recently uploaded asset was of a file type that is not permitted within the DAM and is awaiting GSA approval.

kpmg.workflow.assetUploadActivate.pushed.sling:message: Your recently uploaded asset was placed in the incorrect folder. This has now been automatically moved to the correct folder.

kpmg.workflow.autoGeneratedText.sling:message: This is an automatically generated message. Please do not reply.
